sen.j: 近江屋（おうみや）は京都の由緒ある醤油屋である。
sen.e: Omiya is a venerable soy sauce store in Kyoto.
Omiya is a venerable soy sauce store in Kyoto.
Omiya is a venerable soy sauce store in Kyoto.

sen.j: 現在の四条河原町一帯に土地を持っていた名家、井口家の近江屋井口新助が営んでいた。
sen.e: The store was managed by Shinsuke IGUCHI of Omiya from Iguchi family, a reputable family that owned lands in the area of present Shijo Kawaramachi.
The store was managed by Shinsuke IGUCHI of Omiya from Iguchi family, a reputable family that owned lands in the area of present Shijo Kawaramachi.
The store was managed by Shinsuke IGUCHI of Omiya from Iguchi family, a reputable family that owned lands in the area of present Shijo Kawaramachi.

sen.j: 坂本龍馬や中岡慎太郎が暗殺された場所としても知られる（近江屋事件）。
sen.e: It is also known as a place where Ryoma SAKAMOTO and Shintaro NAKAOKA were assassinated.
It is also known as a place where Ryoma SAKAMOTO and Shintaro NAKAOKA were assassinated.
It is also known as a place where Ryoma SAKAMOTO and Shintaro NAKAOKA were assassinated (the Omiya incident).

sen.j: 近江屋の跡地には現在では旅行代理店が建ち、坂本・中岡遭難之地としての石碑のみが残る。
sen.e: Now a travel agency is located at the site of Omiya, and only a stone monument tells it was the place Sakamoto and Nakaoka met a disaster.
Now a travel agency is located at the site of Omiya, and only a stone monument remains in the place where Sakamoto and Nakaoka met a disaster.
Now a travel agency is located at the site of Omiya, and only a stone monument remains in the place where Sakamoto and Nakaoka met a disaster.

sen.j: 近江屋主人の井口家の墓は金戒光明寺にある。
sen.e: A grave of the Iguchi family, the master of Omiya, is in Konkai Komyo-ji Temple.
A grave of the Iguchi family, the master of Omiya, is located in Konkai Komyo-ji Temple.
A grave of the Iguchi family, the master of Omiya, is located in Konkai Komyo-ji Temple.
